entry.name: pageload
entry.title: pageload
entry.desc: Triggered after the page is successfully loaded and inserted into the DOM.

longdesc.strong: Note: The triggering of this event is deprecated as of jQuery Mobile 1.4.0. It will no longer be triggered in 1.5.0.
longdesc.p: The replacement for is pagecontainerload. In jQuery Mobile 1.4.0, the two events are identical except for their name.
